entries.abort: Yeah, that's right Imperial scum. Run away.
entries.arrival_phase_1: You have arrived at the meeting location. We are sending out a warning for the vessel to be stopped for a search.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The vessel has complied with our request. Dock and start the inspection of the vessel.
entries.complete: The vessel had the location of the head of the smuggling operation. Stand by to capture the responsible party.
entries.docking_complete: The search should be concluded momentarily. Stand by.
entries.docking_started: Starting the search of the vessel. Stand by for further instructions.
entries.failed_destroy: You let that vessel be destroyed? We needed that ship to find out more about the smuggling operation.
entries.quest_dock_d: Dock with the freighter and look for information about the head of the smuggler operation.
entries.quest_escort_d: Throw the back the small fish now in order to catch the big fish later.
entries.quest_location_d: Meet the contact freighter in the Corellia system.
entries.recovery_success: Are you done. I hope you found what you were looking for.
entries.rescue_abandoned: I told you that I didn't have anything you wanted.
entries.rescue_phase_1: Fine, you can search my ship. I have nothing to hide.
entries.rescue_phase_2: See I had nothing that would interest you.
entries.split_quest_alert: Stand by for further information about the location of the head of the smuggling operation, Polard Manfred. Bring this smuggler into custody.
entries.title: Space Corellia: Meet the Smuggler
entries.title_d: The information gathered from the vessel attempting to leave the Yavin system revealed that there is a large smuggling operation taking place in the Corellia system. Travel to Corellia and meet with the vessel that was supposed to be the freighters contact.
